mapper.select: SELECT title ,cntnts ,expsr_lc_cd ,a.menuid ,a.siteid ,login_need_yn ,popup_type_cd ,strt_dt ,end_dt ,width_size ,vrtcl_size ,top_lc ,left_lc ,ntc_trgt_cd ,ntc_trgt_roleid ,popupntcid ,b.NM role_nm ,c.nm menu_nm FROM TB_CMM_POPUPNTC a left outer join tb_cmm_role b on (a.ntc_trgt_roleid = b.ROLEID) left outer join tb_cmm_menu c on (a.MENUID=c.MENUID) WHERE 1=1 AND popupntcid = #{popupntcid}
